explains: n. 妨碍，障碍；口吃，结巴

sentences.en: John's slight speech impediment made it difficult for his mother to understand him.
sentences.cn: 约翰轻微的口吃使他母亲难以听懂他。

sentences.en: The level of inflation is a serious impediment to economic recovery.
sentences.cn: 通货膨胀是影响经济复苏的严重障碍。

sentences.en: He was satisfied that there was no legal impediment to the marriage.
sentences.cn: 他对于这场婚姻没有法律上的障碍感到很满意。
